entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of plug-in Validate EFM successful, version 1.21.1. - validate/EFM
[info] Activation of plug-in Inline XBRL Document Set successful, version 1.1. - inlineXbrlDocumentSet

[DQC.IFRS.0102.9540] Assets with a value of 20,456,000,000 is not equal to the combined total of Current Assets and Noncurrent assets ( 10,321,000,000 + 10,011,000,000 ) with a value of 20,332,000,000. These values should be equal. If assets held for sale is included in the Statement of Financial Position presentation, then consider using CurrentAssetsOtherThanAssetsOrDisposalGroupsClassifiedAsHeldForSaleOrAsHeldForDistributionToOwners instead of current assets. The properties of this ifrs-full:Assets fact are: Period :2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : DKK Decimals of Assets : -6 Decimals of Current Assets : -6 Decimals of Non Current Assets : -6
Rule Element Id:9540 Rule version: 17.0.0 - https://filings.xbrl.org/213800G7EG4156NNPG91/2021-06-30/ESEF/DK/0/213800G7EG4156NNPG91-2021-06-30-en.zip/213800G7EG4156NNPG91-2021-06-30-en/reports/213800G7EG4156NNPG91-2021-06-30-en.xhtml 5349

[DQC.IFRS.0102.9541] Liabilities with a value of 12,326,000,000 is not equal to the combined total of Current Liabilities and Noncurrent Liabilites ( 8,271,000,000 + 3,964,000,000 ) with a value of 12,235,000,000. Consider using the element CurrentLiabilitiesOtherThanLiabilitiesIncludedInDisposalGroupsClassifiedAsHeldForSale other than CurrentLiabilities.
These values should be equal. The properties of this ifrs-full:Liabilities fact are: Period :2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : DKK Decimals of Liabilities : -6 Decimals of Current Liabilities : -6 Decimals of Non Current Liabilities : -6
Rule Element Id:9541 Rule version: 17.0.0 - https://filings.xbrl.org/213800G7EG4156NNPG91/2021-06-30/ESEF/DK/0/213800G7EG4156NNPG91-2021-06-30-en.zip/213800G7EG4156NNPG91-2021-06-30-en/reports/213800G7EG4156NNPG91-2021-06-30-en.xhtml 5349

[DQC.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of [00020] - Statement - StatementOfComprehensiveIncome but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests, ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 17.0.0 -

[DQC.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of [00010] - Statement - IncomeStatement but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 17.0.0 -

[DQC.IFRS.0129.9625] It is expected that ProfitLossAttributableToOwnersOfParent with a value of -103,000,000 reported in the network role http://xbrl.flsmidth.com/role/IncomeStatement should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, ProfitLoss with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParentMember and a reported value of 103,000,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://xbrl.flsmidth.com/role/StatementOfChangesInEquity. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToOwnersOfParent fact are:
Period : 2021-01-01 to 2021-06-30 Dimensions : Unit : DKK Decimals of ProfitLossAttributableToOwnersOfParent : -6 Decimals of ProfitLoss : -6 Rule version: 17.0.0 - https://filings.xbrl.org/213800G7EG4156NNPG91/2021-06-30/ESEF/DK/0/213800G7EG4156NNPG91-2021-06-30-en.zip/213800G7EG4156NNPG91-2021-06-30-en/reports/213800G7EG4156NNPG91-2021-06-30-en.xhtml 5349

property.name: label
property.value: Profit (loss), attributable to owners of parent
